<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as assembly code. This is a separate class from GCStrategy in order to allow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// users of the LLVM JIT to avoid linking with the AsmWriter.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Subclasses of GCMetadataPrinter must be registered using the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// GCMetadataPrinterRegistry. This is separate from the GCStrategy itself</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because these subclasses are logically plugins for the AsmWriter.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
